title: (4340) Brand New House for Sale, at Piliyandala, Batuwandara
details: Brand New House for Sale, at Piliyandala, Batuwandara. The House is Completely Tiled With 3 Bed Rooms, 2 Bath Room Living Room, Dining Room, Pantry, Car Porch & a Beautifully Designed House, Surrounded by walls. 400m to Piliyandala, Bandaragama, Colombo Main Road, Immediately Available for Sale at Rs 83 (Negotiable) 8.3 Million
